
=head1 NAME

chapter

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 identifier (character varying) - A unique identifier for the chapter.
 title (character varying) - 
 report (character varying) - 
 number (integer) - 
 url (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                 Table "gcis_metadata.chapter"
    Column   |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  |             Description              
 ------------+-------------------+-----------+----------+--------------------------------------
  identifier | character varying | not null  | extended | A unique identifier for the chapter.
  title      | character varying |           | extended | 
  report     | character varying | not null  | extended | 
  number     | integer           |           | plain    | 
  url        | character varying |           | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "chapter_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier, report)
     "uk_number_report" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (number, report)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "chapter_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (report) REFERENCES report(identifier) MATCH FULL
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "figure" CONSTRAINT "figure_chapter_report" FOREIGN KEY (chapter, report) REFERENCES chapter(identifier, report)
     TABLE "finding" CONSTRAINT "finding_chapter_report" FOREIGN KEY (chapter, report) REFERENCES chapter(identifier, report)
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON chapter FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON chapter FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     delpub BEFORE DELETE ON chapter FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE delete_publication()
     updatepub BEFORE UPDATE ON chapter FOR EACH ROW WHEN (new.identifier::text <> old.identifier::text OR new.report::text <> old.report::text) EXECUTE PROCEDURE update_publication()
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
